name: Stalks Stalks Stalks
description:
Have you ever wanted to make a bunch of money? To get rich by doing nothing? To become wealthy without ever developing a useful skill or trade? What if I told you there was a game that let you live out that fantasy in a pretend world? Well, that game is Stalks Stalks Stalks!

Compete against your friends, strangers, or no one and try and buy and sell stalks to make money. The player with the highest number wins! Everyone else loses! If you get the highest number, congratulations! If you get the lowest number, well, at least you didn't lose anything of real value...

Features

  • Buy stalks
  • Sell stalks
  • Collect dividends
  • Take out loans
  • Pay your loans
  • Default on your loans
  • Go bankrupt
